name: Christmas Repair
description:
A game made for the Shenanijam 2019

Use WASD to move and E to open toolboxes.

Themes used:

Cursemas Eve.

Wrenches 101

Achievements:

  • Tango - Your team size is 2.
  • Totally Ethical Surprise Mechanics - The primary means of progressing through the game is lootboxes.
  • Ultimate Idle - The game plays itself on boot-up, and if the player does nothing the game will just keep playing itself.

Story:It's Christmas Eve.  You're a mechanic that got offered some work from a strange woman. You repaired her car and charged her(more than you should have) but oh no. She's a witch! Now you have to fight Christmas monsters to lift the curse she put on you.

This was made in under 72 hours for the Shenanijam 2019, the title, trailer and Image for the game were also last minute, so that's why they aren't very good.
